info.title: Open API of Marine Heatwaves
info.description:
Marine heatwaves (MHWs) evaluated from 0.25-degree gridded NOAA OISST v2.1, compiled by ODB, Taiwan. 
Reference: Jacox, Alexander, Bograd, and Scott (2020), Thermal Displacement by Marine Heatwaves, Nature, 584, 82–86, doi:10.1038/s41586-020-2534-z

get.description:
Query MHW data by longitude/latitude/date (in JSON), providing monthly marine heatwave levels, sea surface temperature (SST), SST anomalies, and thermal displacements at a 0.25° x 0.25° global resolution. See more: https://eco.odb.ntu.edu.tw/pub/MHW

#### Usage
* One-point MHWs without time-span limitation: e.g. /api/mhw?lon0=135&lat0=15
* Bounding-box <= 10 x 10 in degrees: 10-years time-span limitation: e.g. /api/mhw?lon0=135&lon1=140&lat0=15&lat1=30&start=2013-01-01 (data from 2013/01/01 to 2022/12/01)
* Bounding-box > 10 x 10 in degrees: 1-year time-span limitation: e.g. /api/mhw?lon0=135&lon1=150&lat0=15&lat1=30&start=2013-01-01 (data from 2013/01/01 to 2013/12/01)
* Bounding-box > 90 x 90 in degrees: 1-month time-span limitation: e.g. /api/mhw?lon0=-180&lon1=180&lat0=-90&lat1=90&start=2013-01-01 (data of 2013/01/01)

parameters.name: start

schema.description: Start date of MHWs to query, minimum is 1982-01-01
schema.title: Start

parameters.description: Start date of MHWs to query, minimum is 1982-01-01

parameters.name: end

schema.description: End date of MHWs to query, maximum is one month before the current date
schema.title: End

parameters.description: End date of MHWs to query, maximum is one month before the current date

parameters.name: append

schema.description: Data fields to append, separated by commas. Allowed fields: 'sst', 'sst_anomaly', 'level', 'td'
schema.title: Append

parameters.description: Data fields to append, separated by commas. Allowed fields: 'sst', 'sst_anomaly', 'level', 'td'

schema.title: Response Read Mhw Api Mhw Get

get.description:
Query MHW data by longitude/latitude/date (in csv), providing monthly marine heatwave levels, sea surface temperature (SST), SST anomalies, and thermal displacements at a 0.25° x 0.25° global resolution. See more: https://eco.odb.ntu.edu.tw/pub/MHW

#### Usage
* One-point MHWs without time-span limitation: e.g. /api/mhw/csv?lon0=135&lat0=15
* Bounding-box <= 10 x 10 in degrees: 10-years time-span limitation: e.g. /api/mhw/csv?lon0=135&lon1=140&lat0=15&lat1=30&start=2013-01-01 (data from 2013/01/01 to 2022/12/01)
* Bounding-box > 10 x 10 in degrees: 1-year time-span limitation: e.g. /api/mhw/csv?lon0=135&lon1=150&lat0=15&lat1=30&start=2013-01-01 (data from 2013/01/01 to 2013/12/01)
* Bounding-box > 90 x 90 in degrees: 1-month time-span limitation: e.g. /api/mhw/csv?lon0=-180&lon1=180&lat0=-90&lat1=90&start=2013-01-01 (data of 2013/01/01)

parameters.name: start

schema.description: Start date of MHWs to query, minimum is 1982-01-01
schema.title: Start

parameters.name: end

schema.description: End date of MHWs to query, maximum is one month before the current date
schema.title: End

schema.description: Data fields to append, separated by commas. Allowed fields: 'sst', 'sst_anomaly', 'level', 'td'
